game.name: Fruit Master
game.description:
Some people say that when life gives you lemons, you should use them to make lemonade. Till now you have used fruits to prepare delicious fruit juices and cocktails. However, this time you can cut a wide range of scrumptious fruits to have fun and create your score. Are you ready friends to accept this unique challenge? Join Fruit Master and be prepared to cut the fruits and create combos for extra points! Make sure to hit the fruit cocktail to complete the present level.

Cut as much fruits as you can to create your best score in each level in this brand new arcade challenge! Grab your knives and get ready to cut and slice different types of fruits to make some really fresh and refreshing juices! Put your mixologist and cutting abilities to the test to complete your tasks in all the levels! The fruits will keep rotating in different directions and you will have a particular number of knives to throw to slice them all.

Throw your knives at them with the correct timing and make sure to hit multiple pieces of fruit using one single life! Prepare different flavored fruit juices, earn points and buy upgraded knives in this cool HTML5 knife throwing game! Slice different fruits to create mocktails for extra upgrades! Realistic sound effects and physics, different fruits to slash, and multiple new knife models will be there to keep you entertained for hours. Good luck unlocking all the challenges and unlock the new fruit knives and have fun without download!
